switchable_algorithms.name: Generate model
switchable_algorithms.description:
Algorithm used to generate a model. The algorithm must connect to a trax database to fetch data.
 The algorithm generate a model in output.

switchable_algorithms.name: Test data
switchable_algorithms.description:
Algorithm to test data on model generated before. The algorithm must take:
 input model
input file containing data (see Readme of this scenario)
Generate a list of data
